Description.Name: Automated Storage Space
Description.Details: Automating the Argo's internal storage is the future. One last upgrade to the storage cells would let us move to an automated drone inventory system with a few pressurized WorkMechs for special work. Depressurizing some of our inventory and making robots do the work will save us a lot of upkeep by letting us assign the labour and resources elsewhere

AssignedCastDescription: I'm not suggesting that we have robots take everyone's jobs, but it's a fact that machines don't sleep, breathe, eat or complain. Some of our guys could strive to be a little more like that every now and again.
